sentences.sContent: Michael Jr. puts flowers on a headstone... while Linc leaves an origami crane.
sentences.sContent_eng: Michael Jr. puts flowers on a headstone... while Linc leaves an origami crane.
sentences.sCn: 小迈可将花放在了一个墓石上…林肯将一只纸鹤也放在了上面。

sentences.sContent: Her husband lies in the same spot now; and they have each a simple headstone above, and a plain grey block at their feet, to mark the graves.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her husband lies in the same spot now; and they have each a simple headstone above, and a plain grey block at their feet, to mark the graves.
sentences.sCn: 如今她丈夫也葬在同一个地点，他们坟上各竖立一块简单的石碑，它们的脚下也各有一块平平的灰石，作为坟墓的标志。

trans.tranOther: a piece of stone on a grave, with the name of the dead person written on it
